}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :''AX6600 Tri-Band Mesh WiFi 6 System''
*Web GUI: http://router.asus.com
{{See also|ASUS ZenWiFi AX Pro (ET12)|ASUS ZenWiFi AX (ET8)}}
{{FCC ST|12/21/2022|indexme.}}
==Links of Interest== *[https://24wireless.info/list-of-11ax-routers ''List of 802.11ax routers'' on '''24wireless.info'''] (JP)
===News=== *[http://promos.asus.com/US/PR/2019/computex_2019_asus_rog_awards/ ''ASUS Products Win 17 Awards for Innovation at Computex 2019'' on '''ASUS'''] *[https://www.engadget.com/2019/05/27/asus-wifi-6-router-looks-normal/#/ ''ASUS latest WiFi 6 router looks appallingly normal'' on '''Engadget''']
===Reviews=== *[https://urouter.ru/review/asus-zenwifi-pro-xt12.html ''Asus ZenWiFi Pro XT12'' on '''Urouter'''] *[https://dongknows.com/asus-zenwifi-pro-xt12-review/ ''Asus ZenWiFi Pro XT12'' on '''Dongknows'''] *[https://dongknows.com/asus-zenwifi-pro-et12-review/ ''Asus ZenWiFi Pro ET12'' on '''Dongknows''']
==JTAG-Serial Info== ===JTAG=== There is a JTAG port with male headers soldered, there also appears to be a free and exposed set of I2C pins in addition to the JTAG meaning there are free GPIO's on the SoC. Router requires DC powering so leave the VCC pin unconnected.

===Models=== :;[[ASUS ZenWiFi series]] • [[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]]
*[[ASUS ZenWiFi AX Pro (ET12)]] (AXE11000) • ''Tri Band WiFi 6 Router'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTAXE4P00 MSQ-RTAXE4P00] (2021-12-15) • [https://urouter.ru/review/asus-zenwifi-pro-et12.html Review] • [https://edgeup.asus.com/2021/zenwifi-pro-et12-and-zenwifi-pro-xt12/ PR] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking-IoT-Servers/Whole-Home-Mesh-WiFi-System/ZenWiFi-WiFi-Systems/ASUS-ZenWiFi-Pro-ET12/ PPage] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4912 Quad-core ARM @2.0GHz (64-bit), BT 5.0 :Flash: 256MB (Macronix MX30LF2G18AC-TI) :RAM: 1GB (2x Nanya NT5CC256M16ER-EK) :Wi-Fi: 3x [[Broadcom]] BCM43684 (2.4/5/6GHz) • 19V/2.37A ([https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/MSQ-RTAXE4P00/5545544 Label]) :USB: 2x USB 3.2<!--(Type-C/Type-A)-->; WAN/LAN: 2x 2.5GbE, LAN: 2x 1GbE ports *[[ASUS ZenWiFi AX Pro (XT12)]] (AX11000) • ''Tri Band WiFi 6 Router'' :FCC ID: MSQ-RTAX4Q00 (05/05/2022) • [https://urouter.ru/review/asus-zenwifi-pro-xt12.html Review] • [https://edgeup.asus.com/2021/zenwifi-pro-et12-and-zenwifi-pro-xt12/ PR] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking-IoT-Servers/Whole-Home-Mesh-WiFi-System/ZenWiFi-WiFi-Systems/ASUS-ZenWiFi-Pro-XT12/ PPage]
*[[ASUS ZenWiFi AX (ET8)]] (AX6600) • ''AXE6600 Tri Band WiFi Router'' :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/MSQ-RTAXIC00 MSQ-RTAXIC00] (2021-04-13) • 19V/1.75A, 2.4/5/6GHz *[[ASUS ZenWiFi AX (XT8)]] (AX6600) • [[ASUS RT-AX95Q]] • [https://urouter.ru/review/asus-zenwifi-ax-xt8.html Review] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/ZenWiFi-AX-XT8/ PPage] :*[[ASUS RT-AX95Q]] (AX6600) • (HND-947622_BASE)/BCM53134 *[[ASUS ZenWiFi AC (CT8)]] (AC3000) • [[ASUS RT-AC95U]] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/ZenWiFi-AC-CT8/ PPage] :WiFi 5, AC3000, 2.4GHz 2x2 + 5GHz-1 2x2 + 5GHz-2 4x4 :*[[ASUS RT-AC95U]] (AC3000) • (IPQ4019/QCA9884/QCA8072)
*[[ASUS ZenWiFi AC Mini (CD6)]] (AC1500) • Router/Node • [https://www.asus.com/Networking-IoT-Servers/Whole-Home-Mesh-WiFi-System/ZenWiFi-WiFi-Systems/ASUS-ZenWiFi-AC-Mini-CD6/ PPage] :WiFi 5, AC1500, 2.4GHz 4x4 + 5GHz 2x2, AiMesh, AiProtection :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] QCN5502; Memory: 32MB Flash, 128MB RAM *[[ASUS ZenWiFi AX (XD6)]] (AX5400) • ''AX5400 Dual Band WiFi Router'' :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/MSQ-RTAXJG00/5122361 MSQ-RTAXJG00] (2021-02-17) • 12V/2A, 4x LAN • [https://www.asus.com/Networking-IoT-Servers/Whole-Home-Mesh-WiFi-System/ZenWiFi-WiFi-Systems/ASUS-ZenWiFi-AX-XD6/ PPage]
*[[ASUS ZenWiFi AX Mini (XD4R)]] (AX1800) • ''AX1800 Dual Band WiFi Router'' • [https://24wireless.info/asus-zenwifi-ax-mini-xd4 24|W] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTAXJE00 MSQ-RTAXJE00] (2020-04-13) • 12V/1.5A, 1x WAN, 1x LAN, BT • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/ASUS-ZenWiFi-AX-Mini-XD4/ PPage] *[[ASUS ZenWiFi AX Mini (XD4N)]] (AX1800) • ''AX1800 Dual Band WiFi Node'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTAXJE01 MSQ-RTAXJE01] (2020-04-20) • 12V/1.5A, 1x LAN • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/ASUS-ZenWiFi-AX-Mini-XD4/ PPage]
*[[ASUS ZenWiFi AX Hybrid (XP4R)]] (AX1800 + AV1300) • ''Hybrid Mesh Wi-Fi System'' :''AX1800 + AV1300 Dual-band Powerline Mesh WiFi 6 Router'' • [https://urouter.ru/review/asus-zenwifi-ax-hybrid-xp4.html Review] :FCC ID: MSQ-RTAX8300 (2021-05-06) • ''ZenWiFi Hybrid XP4 Router'' *[[ASUS ZenWiFi AX Hybrid (XP4N)]] (AX1800 + AV1300) • ''Hybrid Mesh Wi-Fi System'' :''AX1800 + AV1300 Dual-band Powerline Mesh WiFi 6 Node'' • [https://urouter.ru/review/asus-zenwifi-ax-hybrid-xp4.html Review] :FCC ID: MSQ-RTAX8301 (2021-05-10) • ''ZenWiFi Hybrid XP4 Node'' :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM6755 (4x @1.5GHz) WiSoC (2x2) :Flash: 256MB (Macronix MX30LF2G18AC-TI) :RAM: 256MB (Nanya NT5CC128M16ER-EK) <!-- *[[ASUS ROG STRIX GS-AX5400]] • [[ASUS RT-AX82U]] *[[ASUS ROG STRIX GS-AX3000]] • [[ASUS RT-AX58U]] *[[ASUS GT-AXE11000]] • [https://urouter.ru/review/asus-gt-axe11000.html Review] :FCC ID: MSQ-RTAXJF00 (2020-08-04) -->
